title: Time Cube Watch Face
summary: Your smart watch deserves better than looking like a cheap copy of a dumb one.
developerAddress:
Mathieu Villegas
Avenue de Chateaubriand
Montreal, QC, H2S 2N7
CANADA
description: Time Cube watch face displays the time using 5x5 cubic puzzles.Numbers are displayed using real cube scrambling and unscrambling.With Time Cube, you can: - display hours, minutes and seconds or only hours and minutes - configure faces colours and background with predefined colours or custom colours - configure animation speed - configure behaviours of the colours: random, fixed background colour, fixed number colour or fixed background and number colour - etc...
descriptionHTML:
Time Cube watch face displays the time using 5x5 cubic puzzles.
Numbers are displayed using real cube scrambling and unscrambling.

With Time Cube, you can:
- display hours, minutes and seconds or only hours and minutes
- configure faces colours and background with predefined colours or custom colours
- configure animation speed
- configure behaviours of the colours: random, fixed background colour, fixed number colour or fixed background and number colour
- etc...
comments: Fantastic Face Great options. Unique look. I've downloaded tons of faces but this one truly stands out.
